raw_comment:
I notice that there is a higher number of players of colors than there are head coaches of color. I wonder why this is? But I also understand that coaches just do not come and go. However, the graphs show that POC are clearly not in higher positions very much. We need to put people of color in higher positions. This gives us the statistics we need to push for equality in sports.
Catchy Title: Sideline Diversity
ace_sentences: I notice that the number of players of color is higher than the number of head coaches of color.
I wonder why this is the case.
I understand that coaches do not change frequently.
The graphs show that people of color are not often in higher positions.
We need to put people of color in higher positions.
These statistics help us to push for equality in sports.
